resources.string: FUNDAMENTAL DUTY CHALLENGE BY BABUL NGO
Stop- Click Me When You Finish

FunDu Stands for Fundamental Duty of the Constitution of India. We all enjoy Rights but many do not know that we have Fundamental Duties also. Citizens are morally obligated by the Constitution to perform these duties.
It shall be the duty of every citizen of India to protect and improve the natural environment including forests, lakes, rivers and wild life, and to have compassion for living creatures.

According to Article 51 [a] g of the Constitution of India, it shall be the duty of every Indian to protect the natural environment including forests, lakes, rivers and wildlife and to have compassion for living creatures. #FunduChallenge Fundamental Duty Challenge by Babul NGO
Instructions
1.Click on Audio Button to Record Audio
2.Click on Video Button to Record Video
3.Click on Logout to logout
 ALL THE BEST

As per constitution of India Article 51[A]g,it shall be the duty of every Indian to to protect Natural Environment including Forests, Lakes, Rivers and Wildlife and to have compassion for living creatures.\n#funduchallenge Fundamental Duty Challenge by Babul ngo\n
It shall be the duty of every citizen of India to protect and improve the natural environment including forests, lakes, rivers and wild life, and to have compassion for living creatures.

Babul Films Society is a registered non-profit NGO based out of Hyderabad. In a democratic set up, awareness is the key to live and progress sustainably; Babul Films works to spread knowledge among ignorant and push the aware towards action. Registrar of Societies, Ranga Reddy Dist, Andhra Pradesh, India No.1809/2012 dt. 17-08-2012.

Babul Films Society

 Shaikpetnala, Golconda Post
 Ranga Reddy Dist HYDERABAD
 Andhra Pradesh, India

PIN: 500 008
 Phone: +918897357731
 Email: gangactor@yahoo.com
Babul Films Society is formed with the object of promoting awareness about Environment, Biodiversity and Sustainable Development using short vidoes and various ICT tools.

Vision:- Realise a sustainable society with more environmental awareness and less negligence. \n Mission:- Spread awareness about Environment, Biodiversity and Sustainable Development using short videos and social media in addition to traditional advocacy methods. Use cinema for outreach. \n Values:- We follow the Code of Best Practices in Sustainable Film-making and all our operations causing minimum negative impact on Environment and maintain Green Production values.
